title: Hunting Simulator Game

creator: Woodcock entertainment
descriptionHtml:
Walk, find, aim, shoot - be a hunter, join hunting clash!

Hunting Simulator Game is one of free hunting games. At the same time it isn’t not just dh classic or any other deer games, it includes much more interesting things.

START from clay hunt on the Kuwait map. Test your weapon by moving target shooting and long range sniper shooting.

IMPROVE your skills on other maps/hunting simulator locations. France, Argentina, Mexico are for relaxing hunt and fun. Goose, ducks, pigeon - all of them are here. There aren’t any dangerous animals.
Hunter can try duck hunting, turkey hunting, goose chase.

WIN a hunter clash and become a big game hunter choose: Canada, Chile, Finland, Germany, Greece, Belarus, Greenland, Italy, Kazakhstan, New Zealand, Russia, Spain, Sweden, Turkey, Ukraine, United Kingdom, USA-Alaska, USA-East, Brazil, Africa safari.

Feel the call of the wild and passion of hunting games. A sense of danger will haunt you during the bear hunting games.

HAVE FUN with duck hunting games, turkey hunting and goose chase.

* Weapons to shoot:
Shotguns 8 / 16 / 12g / 12v / 12semi Auto / .410 gauge
Rifles .223/.308/.338/.50 with scopes for best sniper shooter experience.
You can use unique sniper hunting bows and crossbows in this bow hunting games.
Ballistic calculator with wind shift - sniper pay attention to the call of the wind at long distance shooting!
Different projectiles types

* Hunter game accessories: camouflage, flashlight. Decoy calls and turkey calls. Binocular with different zoom and distance calculations. Thermovision and night vision. Hunt & stand.
* Hunting with dogs: give commands and be the dog hunter. Hunt with the dogs like a Pro hunt!
* Use the car drive to make your hunt more exiting. All-terrain vehicle (ATV four wheeler mudding)
driving and snowmobile for winter drive.
* Animals hunt (wild hunt): Moose, Hog, Pig, Boar, Fox, Wolf, Hare.
Deer hunting. Bear hunting. Buck hunting.
* Bird hunting simulator: Woodcock, Pigeon, Partridge, Pheasant, Grouse, Capercaillie.
Duck hunting, Goose chase, Turkey hunting.
* Welcome to hunt for animals in Africa. Safari: Gazelle, Cheetah, Giraffe, Hippopotamus, Hyena, Warthog, Wildebeest, Zebra. Crocodile hunting.
Safri Africa big 5 trophy hunting games with such animals: Leopard, Lion, Rhinoceros, Elephant, Buffalo

Feel the hunter call of the wild nature with:
* Car drive (snowmobile and ATV)
* Animated Gun reloading
* Sniping (sniper shooting)
* Night professional hunt (game night)

FPS Hunting simulator for android is a shooting game. It is a one of the popular free hunting games.

Do hunting animals without internet, cause it's an offline game.
Open the hunting season and join hunter clash right now!

Walk, find, aim, shoot - be the hunter, join hunting clash!



Open hunting season right now!



This hunting game includes:


  • Observe amazing hunting locations in our free mobile game. Map (hunting simulator locations): Argentina, Belarus, hunt animals in forest of Canada, Chile, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Greenland, Italy, Kazakhstan, Kuwait, Mexico, New Zealand, Russia, Spain, Sweden, Turkey, Ukraine, Kingdom United, USA-Alaska, USA-East, Brazil, Africa safari and more. Respect hunting and try new ways to hunt.


  • Hunter can visit shooting range with clay pigeon shooting and target shooting, long range sniper shooting. Feel like an American marksman. This hunting game will become your favorite relaxing sports shooter!




Weapons to shoot:


  • Shotguns 8/16/12g/12v/12semi Auto/.410 caliber .223/.308/.338/.50 rifles with scopes for better sniper experience.

  • Hunting bows and crossbows for bow hunting. Feel like a wild hunter.

  • Ballistic calculator with wind change.Sniper pay attention to the call of the wild when shooting at long range!


  • Different types of projectiles for the different wild animals and birds.




Hunting with dogs. Give commands and train your hunting friend, be the wild hunter. Hunt with dogs like an American marksman and a real Hunter.



Track wild animals like a hunter and upgrade your equipment like a sniper. Feel the call of the wild. Play free animal hunting games and be a part of the great hunting world! Try Animal Hunt (wild animal hunting): Moose, Boar, Traditional Deer Hunt, Big Buck, Bear, Calf, Fox, Wolf, Hare. Realistic animal hunting at its best!



Bird hunting: Goose and Woodcock, duck hunting, pigeon shooting, (clay pigeon shooting, duckz), partridge, pheasant, turkey hunting. Be a part of Hunting clash and best hunting games! Feel like a real hunter and sniper. Be patient and smart because shooting animals requires precision.



In addition, you are welcome to hunt animals in Africa: Crocodail, Gazelle, Gepard, Giraffe, Hippopotamus, Hyena, Warthog, Wildebeest, Zebra. Answer the call of the wild!



Safari Africa big 5 trophy hunting games with such animals: Leopard, Lion, Rhino, Elephant, Buffalo. Hunting at its best!



Hunter follow the call of the wild with:


  • Decoy calls for ducks and geese


  • Binoculars with different zoom and distance calculations


  • Thermovision and night vision (night hunting and winter hunting)


  • Animated gun reload with easy controls


  • Sniping (sniper shooting)




3d hunting game accessories:


  • camouflage for the hunter

  • flashlight and binoculars for night hunting

  • drive a quadro or snowmobile for winter hunting



Our free hunting game for mobile is a shooting game. You are welcome to shoot and hunt animals without internet (offline game)!



Ready to hunt? Download hunting simulator to become wild hunter and win hunting clash.
